entry.title: Guidance
entry.content:
AllLink-official

Hello everyone, welcome to our website!

We Focus on making everyone chat online without hindrance all over the world and study free. You can learn topics as following.

  1. Free VPN Softwares/Proxy Tools (mainly free softwares)
  2. Useful learning websites
  3. Study sources (PDF)
  4. AI/Machine Learning
  5. Computer Science (CS)
  6. Data Science (DS)
  7. Biology/Bioscience/Life Science
  8. Chemistry
  9. Physics
  10. Mathematics

Note: allowed to be used for study; not allowed to be commercial

Follow us

  • GIthub
  • Bitbucket
  • Hugging face
  • GitLab
  • Gitea

entry.title: A Post make all devices connect the whole World
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

A Post make all devices connect the whole World

Due to the policies of some countries or regions, many people cannot search associated-content by Google/Youtube for studying, therefor we list mainly useful APP to achive it. We summarize the APP(Android, iOS/iPadOS/MacOS, Windows, Linux) and provide you links. Because of open sources, they're very safe.

Android

  1. V2RayNG https://github.com/2dust/v2rayNG/releases
  2. Clash for Android (F-droid)
  3. Hiddify https://github.com/hiddify/hiddify-app/releases

Windows

  2. ClashN https://github.com/2dust/clashN/releases
  3. Clash for Windows https://github.com/clashdownload/Clash_for_Windows/releases

entry.title: Save and manage any website you loved
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

Hey everyone! Iâ€™ve got something truly exciting to share. Imagine having a personal library where all your favorite articles, videos, and web content are stored, easily accessible whenever you need them. Thatâ€™s exactly what the Pocket app offers!

Pocket is a fantastic tool that lets you save all sorts of content for later reading or viewing. Whether you come across an insightful article during a busy workday, or a thought-provoking video that you just donâ€™t have the time to watch immediately, Pocket has your back. Simply save the content to Pocket, and itâ€™ll be there waiting for you when you have a moment to spare.

One of the best features of Pocket is its seamless integration with your daily routine. You can save content directly from your browser, or even from your favorite apps using the share button. And if youâ€™re someone who likes to consume content on the go, Pocketâ€™s offline mode is a game-changer. No internet? No problem. Access your saved items anytime, anywhere.

Plus, Pocket makes it easy to keep your saved content organized with tags, so you can effortlessly find that article on deep-sea exploration you saved last month. And for those who enjoy a good listen, Pocketâ€™s text-to-speech functionality turns articles into an audio experience.

So, if youâ€™re looking to streamline your reading and viewing habits and never miss out on great content again, Pocket is the app for you. Download it today and start saving smarter! ğŸ“šâœ¨

Pocketæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾Android/iOSè½¯ä»¶ï¼Œå½“ç„¶ä¹Ÿæœ‰ç½‘é¡µç«¯ ã€‚ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯è¯·ä» Google Play Store / App Store ä¸‹è½½ã€‚æµè§ˆå™¨æ’ä»¶æä¾›æ›´ä¾¿æ·çš„ä¿å­˜ç½‘ç«™æ“ä½œï¼Œ Edge å’Œ Chrome æœ‰ å¯¹åº”çš„æ’ä»¶ã€‚
